definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

chao1 wen2 ben3 chuan2 song4 xie2 yi4
chao1 wen2 ben3 biao1 ji4 yu3 yan2

sentences.english: Text analysis is the process of enabling computers to extract meaning from text.
sentences.chinese: 文本分析是指使計算機能夠從文本中提取意義的過程。

sentences.english: Text analysis is the process of enabling computers to extract meaning from text.
sentences.chinese: 文本分析是指使計算機能夠從文本中提取意義的過程。

sentences.english: Perfecting the contract text and avoid legal loss.
sentences.chinese: 完善合同文本，避免法律損失。

sentences.english: The text is a sane conversation with millions of participants.
sentences.chinese: 文本是一次與無數參與者的理智交談。

sentences.english: Reading comprehension is a reading process where readers can construct the meaning of version.
sentences.chinese: 讀解就是讀者建構文本意義的閱讀過程。

sentences.english: However, the present recognition of TV essays still remains on the text-oriented level.
sentences.chinese: 但當前對電視散文的認識仍然停留在文本主導論層次。

sentences.english: Specify a constraining rule on the text in an element with mixed content.
sentences.chinese: 在具有混合內容的元素的文本中指定一個約束規則。

sentences.english: The negotiating groups have developed consolidated legal text in virtually all negotiating groups.
sentences.chinese: 談判小組在幾乎所有的談判中均已完成法律文本合併。

sentences.english: Edit text, colors, styling, and layout using the new tablet UI look.
sentences.chinese: 編輯文本，色彩，造型和佈局使用新的UI看片。

sentences.english: We do some research on binarization of gray image and character segmentation.
sentences.chinese: 研究了灰度文本圖像二值化及字符分割。

sentences.english: When the rectangle's events are triggered, the text's attributes change accordingly.
sentences.chinese: 觸發矩形的事件時，文本的屬性就會相應地改變。

sentences.english: Incorporate quotations of three lines or less into the text, within single quotation marks.
sentences.chinese: 文本中三行或更少的合併的引用語，用單引號。

sentences.english: Creates a single-line text entry control.
sentences.chinese: 創建一個單行的文本輸入控件。

sentences.english: Thus, we have chosen to focus these articles on free-form text.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我們把本系列的重點放在形式自由的文本上。

sentences.english: Seed: Looking forward, what other text-based visualizations are you planning to develop?
sentences.chinese: 展望未來，還有什麼其他的文本圖像化技術準備開發？

sentences.english: Besides adding text, you can add tags and hyperlinks to the note.
sentences.chinese: 除文本外，還可以在便籤中添加標記和超鏈接。

definition: marginal notes/annotation/to annotate/to add comments to text
